entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
